build.startCommand: sh -c 'JAR_FILE=$(find target -name "*.jar" -type f -exec ls -1t {} + | head -n 1) && java -jar $JAR_FILE'
build.run: sh -c 'JAR_FILE=$(find target -name "*.jar" -type f -exec ls -1t {} + | head -n 1) && java -jar $JAR_FILE'

deploy.startCommand: sh -c 'JAR_FILE=$(find target -name "*.jar" -type f -exec ls -1t {} + | head -n 1) && java -Xmx512m -Xms256m -jar $JAR_FILE'
